enum SAICompany::CompanyID

Different constants related to CompanyID.

Enumerator:
COMPANY_INVALID 

An invalid company.

COMPANY_INACTIVE_CLIENT 

The client is joining.

COMPANY_NEW_COMPANY 

The client wants a new company.
